answers.author: Ali Miller Richards
answers.text:
ICMA member dues rates vary based on employer type and job function. To determine your membership dues rate, visit http://icma.org/en/icma/members/join/join_now/dues_rates.

author: Dean Brookshier
text: How do you figure a membership renewel. Is it taking your salary and multiplying by .010. Thank you!
